name: 2-in-1 - Dragon Ball Z Gamepack - The Legacy of Goku I & II [GBA]
description: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku is a series of video games for the Game Boy Advance, based on the anime series Dragon Ball Z. All three games are action role-playing games. The first game, Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku was developed by Webfoot Technologies and released in 2002. In 2016, Webfoot Technologies announced the start of development of another sequel.
